attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There a lot of animal lovers out there that care great Deal for their pets dogs cats birds all animals.The Elderly loves a pet like a cat and a dog for company when living on their own.
why can`t all animals have NHS service free treatment ,I know vets do a wondrful job but they are so expensive and people can`t afford to take their animals to vets with high prices it is so sad on the animals as so many suffer and that shouldnt be happening ,If there was free treatment for all animals you find they be cared for and Elederly can afford to keep them...
Anyone agrees please sign your name fro support lets be caring of animals of the earth ,,,all creatures great and small//

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
